anya-e0105n32:1_0: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṁ nāma pātimokkhaṭṭhakathaṁ ācariyabuddhaghosatthero soṇattherena yācito mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ
anya-e0105n32:1_1: vācanāmagganissitaṁ sīhaḷapātimokkhaṭṭhakathānayaṁ nissāya ekampi padaṁ pāḷiyā vā mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi
anya-e0105n32:7_0: Vattayissāmi nāmena, kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṁ subha’’nti kaṅkhā aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n32:10_0: Nissāya sā ayaṁ niṭṭhaṁ, gatā ādāya sabbaso;
anya-e0105n32:12_0: Na hettha taṁ padaṁ atthi, yaṁ virujjheyya pāḷiyā;
anya-e0105n32:13_0: Mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ, porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi vā’’ti kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
